text: Hi Teddy, so sorry its been so long, I foolishly didn't put the 15th in my diary and since then time has flown by, I do apologise. I'd not forgotten about you! We had a couple of people leave the team, so there's been more work to pick up, so 3 weeks felt like yesterday. Let pick up our chats again! Would you be free next Weds 20th at 4pm? If you've got any more work for your showreel since we last chatted, then do send it over.

I saw Daniel Waterman from Carse and Waterman at the VFX Festival and he said he does take 2nd years for work experience, if you're interested, you can send him your reel and a cover letter and CV. He always looking for really motivated and enthusiastic students from Staffs
